tool_description: Contacts and evaluates vendor references to validate performance, reliability, and client satisfaction.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor whose references to check

reference_contacts.description: List of reference contact information provided by vendor

project_similarity_required.description: Whether references must be from similar projects

reference_recency_months.description: Maximum age of reference projects in months

minimum_references_required.description: Minimum number of successful reference contacts required

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist
Insufficient references: At least 2 reference contacts must be provided
Invalid recency months: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 120
Reference contact failed: Unable to reach minimum number of references
Evaluation criteria missing: At least 3 evaluation criteria must be specified
usage: Provide vendor_id, reference_contacts, and evaluation_criteria. Set project_similarity_required and reference_recency_months based on validation needs.

performance_rating.description: Average performance rating from references from 0-100

reliability_rating.description: Average reliability rating from references from 0-100

reference_feedback.description: Key feedback points from reference conversations

reference_summary.description: Summary of reference check results and recommendations
